extendedIngredients.name: celery stalks
extendedIngredients.original: 9 cups thinly sliced celery stalks (about 2 bunches)

extendedIngredients.name: ginger
extendedIngredients.original: 1 thin round of peeled fresh ginger
extendedIngredients.originalName: thin round of peeled fresh ginger

extendedIngredients.name: low-salt chicken broth
extendedIngredients.original: 6 cups (or more) homemade chicken stock or canned low-salt broth
extendedIngredients.originalName: (or more) homemade chicken stock or canned low-salt broth

extendedIngredients.name: parsnips
extendedIngredients.original: 2 cups finely chopped peeled parsnips (about 12 ounces)

title: Celery and Parsnip Soup with Green Onion-Dill Matzo Balls
summary: Celery and Parsnip Soup with Green Onion-Dill Matzo Balls is a gluten free, dairy free, and whole 30 soup. This recipe serves 8. One portion of this dish contains around 5g of protein, 10g of fat, and a total of 162 calories. For $1.31 per serving, this recipe covers 13% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Only a few people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. Autumn will be even more special with this recipe. If you have low-salt broth, celery stalks, round of ginger, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 78%. This score is pretty good. Similar recipes are Chicken Soup With Matzo Balls, Chicken Soup with Matzo Balls, and Chicken Soup with Matzo Balls.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Melt margarine in heavy large pot over medium heat. Add next 5 ingredients. Cover; cook 10 minutes. Add 6 cups stock; bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer uncovered until vegetables are very tender, about 15 minutes.                                                                Working in batches, puree soup in blender until very smooth, adding celery leaves to each batch. Return to pot. Thin with more broth, if desired. Season with salt and pepper. (Can be made 2 days ahead. Chill until cold. Cover; keep chilled.)                                                                Rewarm soup. Serve with Green Onion-Dill Matzo Balls.

steps.step: Melt margarine in heavy large pot over medium heat.
Add next 5 ingredients. Cover; cook 10 minutes.
Add 6 cups stock; bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer uncovered until vegetables are very tender, about 15 minutes.

Working in batches, puree soup in blender until very smooth, adding celery leaves to each batch. Return to pot. Thin with more broth, if desired. Season with salt and pepper. (Can be made 2 days ahead. Chill until cold. Cover; keep chilled.)
Serve with Green Onion-Dill Matzo Balls.
